meanings.definition: A person who performs dangerous stunts in place of an actor.
meanings.sent1: The brave stuntman jumped from the building for the movie scene.
meanings.sent2: The stuntman's role in the film was to do all the risky actions.
meanings.sent3: The stuntman pretended to fall off the horse, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Being a stuntman is like being a real-life superhero, risking it all for entertainment.
meanings.sent5: The stuntman's job is to make the audience gasp in amazement with daring feats.

meanings.definition: To work as a stuntman in the film industry.
meanings.sent1: He decided to stuntman in action movies after training for years.
meanings.sent2: She will stuntman in the upcoming blockbuster film.
meanings.sent3: They plan to stuntman in the new James Bond movie, showcasing their skills.
meanings.sent4: Stuntmanning requires precision and fearlessness to execute dangerous scenes.
meanings.sent5: In order to stuntman effectively, one must be physically fit and mentally prepared.
